      • onDateSet

        public void onDateSet(android.widget.DatePicker view,
                      int year,
                      int month,
                      int day)
        When user sets the date, show their choice in the eventDate textView
        Specified by:
        onDateSet in interface android.app.DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener
        Parameters:
        view - The date picker shown via the fragment
        year - Year the user chose
        month - Month the user chose
        day - Day the user chose

        public int getYear()
        Get the selected year
        Returns:
        The selected year (e.g. 2004 returns the integer 2004)

      • getMonth

        public int getMonth()
        Get the selected month
        Returns:
        The selected month as an integer with January as 0 and December as 11

      • getDay

        public int getDay()
        Get the selected day
        Returns:
        The selected day of the month with the first day represented by 1

      • isSet

        public boolean isSet()
        Check whether the user has set a date
        Returns:
        true if the user has set a date, false otherwise
